name: Digital Sun - Playtest Build
description:
Welcome to Digital Sun, a game being developed by two students at UAT:

Austin Foulks - General Designer, Programmer, Audio Design

Marquez Allen - Level Designer

The game takes inspiration from the likes of Risk of Rain, Rust, and Don't Starve, but we hope it'll stand out on its own once it's close to completion.

v 0.1
